longMSG:
You are in the secret room on the 1st floor. 
 There are a gunSafe, a lab table, and a metal cabinet.
 You may go back to library by opening the sliding door.
shortMSG:
You are in the library on the 1st floor. 
 Features: gunSafe, lab table, metal cabinet
 Areas you may go to: west - sliding door to library - 1st floor
